actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects the following Representatives to certain House committees: (1) Mervin M. Dymally of California to the Committee on the District of Columbia; (2) Charles E. Schumer of New York and Gus Savage of Illinois to the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service; and (3) Antonio Borja Won Pat to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
